overview: Edison Tongol is the co-founder and Editor-in-Chief of TechnoFierce, he has a strong desire for technology journalism. His strong interest in web technology brings her to our organization, where he enjoys reporting the latest news about gadget devices. This hot dude also covers stories from mobile industry, internet, post-PC product launches. Email: edison [at] technofierce.com
